translation.en: -[Voletta] Hello? -[B.I.G.] What’s up, Ma?
translation.zh: -喂？-你好吗 妈？

translation.en: Christopher, are you calling me from London?
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗 你到伦敦了？

translation.en: No, canceled that trip. Still in Cali.
translation.zh: 没有 行程取消了 我还在加州

translation.en: Listen, be careful. I’m not comfortable with you there.
translation.zh: 你一定要小心 你在那里我不放心 你知道的吧？

translation.en: You understand? You know that?
translation.zh: 你在那里我不放心 你知道的吧？

translation.en: Ma, how many times I got to tell you?
translation.zh: 妈 要说多少次你才听？

translation.en: I’m safe here. Got nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 我在这里很安全 你不用担心

translation.en: Please, Christopher. Leave as soon as you can. I love you.
translation.zh: 听我的 克里斯托弗 尽快离开那里 我爱你

translation.en: I love you, Ma.
translation.zh: 我爱你 妈

translation.en: Hey, Brian. [sighs]
translation.zh: 布莱恩

translation.en: -Thanks for dressing up. -That’s the upside to working Narcotics.
translation.zh: 谢谢你盛装前来 这是干缉毒的好处你在抢劫凶案组怎么样？

translation.en: -So, how are things in Robbery Homicide? -That's what I wanted to talk about.
translation.zh: 这是干缉毒的好处你在抢劫凶案组怎么样？ 今天就是为这个找你

translation.en: Lots of people saying nice things about you, the work you did
translation.zh: 很多人对你称赞有加 格雷格

translation.en: -with the Torres Task Force. -That was three years of my life.
translation.zh: 你在托雷斯案专案组表现优异 我投入了整整三年

translation.en: -It's a career case. Congratulations. -Still got to convict his ass.
translation.zh: -有这样的功劳前途不愁 恭喜你-他还没被定罪

translation.en: Not your job.
translation.zh: 你不该操心这个

translation.en: [clears throat] What do you know about the Christopher Wallace murder?
translation.zh: 你知道克里斯托弗华莱士谋杀案吗？

translation.en: Biggie? Shit, everyone in the department knew about that.
translation.zh: 比基？每个警察都知道这案子

translation.en: It’s been almost ten years. R.H.D. investigated it, led by Russell Poole.
translation.zh: 已经快十年了 当年是我们组调查的 组长是罗素普尔

translation.en: -You know anything about him? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你知道他吗？-知道

translation.en: I know he thought the cops might have been involved.
translation.zh: 他认为警察可能牵涉其中

translation.en: -I didn't do it if that's why we're here. -Wallace's mother filed a lawsuit
translation.zh: 如果是为了这个找我 不是我干的 华莱士的母亲根据普尔的结论状告警局

translation.en: based on Poole's claims.
translation.zh: 华莱士的母亲根据普尔的结论状告警局

translation.en: It’s gone back and forth in the court, but it's not going away.
translation.zh: 现在双方正在法庭上拉锯但事情不会平息的

translation.en: 400 million dollars.
translation.zh: 她索赔四亿美元

translation.en: That's what some economist said Wallace's lifetime earnings would have been.
translation.zh: 有经济学家计算出这是她儿子一辈子的收入

translation.en: Testified to it.
translation.zh: 并为此出庭作证

translation.en: 400 million dollars? Jesus, I should have been a rapper.
translation.zh: 四亿美元？老天 我真该去当说唱歌手

translation.en: A number like that would bankrupt the city
translation.zh: 这样的索赔金额肯定会让市政府破产

translation.en: and that's why you're going to take another look at things.
translation.zh: 所以你要重启这个案子

translation.en: Try to find out who really killed The Notorious B.I.G.
translation.zh: 找出杀害“声名狼藉先生”的真凶

translation.en: -With you? -Department wants fresh eyes on this.
translation.zh: 和你一起？ 局里想用新人新思路我当年参加过调查

translation.en: I was part of the original investigation, so I am there to supervise and support.
translation.zh: 局里想用新人新思路我当年参加过调查 所以只从旁监督和提供支持

translation.en: Okay, one question.
translation.zh: 我只有一个问题

translation.en: Is my objective to solve the case, or cover the department's ass?
translation.zh: 我的目标是破案还是给警局擦屁股？

translation.en: You go where the case leads you, wherever it leads you.
translation.zh: 不管证据指向什么结果 你都尽管查

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 那行

translation.en: Okay. Then, where do I start?
translation.zh: 从哪开始？

translation.en: -Can I help you? -You looking at something?
translation.zh: -你有事吗？-你看什么看？

translation.en: Roll your window up, bitch! Yeah, keep talking.
translation.zh: -把你车窗摇上去 贱人-你就瞎说吧

translation.en: What? Yo, I will light your ass up!
translation.zh: 不服？我搞死你

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么？

translation.en: What you want to do? You looking like you want to do something?
translation.zh: 你想怎么样？看你这眼神是想较量？

translation.en: -I’m right here. -You want to do something?
translation.zh: -奉陪到底-你想较量？

translation.en: Let's do it, pal.
translation.zh: -较量较量-谁怕谁

translation.en: -What’s up? Where you going? -Peace, brother.
translation.zh: -你想怎么样？你要去哪？-冷静 兄弟

translation.en: Come with that shit? Where you going, punk bitch?
translation.zh: 你给我下来！你要去哪 混蛋？

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: I told you I’d cap your ass, bitch.
translation.zh: 我说过我会搞死你 贱人

translation.en: Police! Throw your weapon on the ground!
translation.zh: 警察！把武器扔到地上！

translation.en: Hey, call 9-1-1. Police. It’s all right!
translation.zh: 快报警 我是警察 没事的

translation.en: Show me your hands.
translation.zh: 举起手

translation.en: Show me your hands!
translation.zh: 举起手！

translation.en: Oh, I swear to God, I am not retiring until they fix the air in this place.
translation.zh: 我发誓 如果他们不修好这里的空调我绝对不退休

translation.en: Every day is too hot, it’s too cold.
translation.zh: 整天不是太热就是太冷

translation.en: My balls are sweating, my balls are shriveling.
translation.zh: 我的蛋蛋一会儿出汗 一会儿缩紧

translation.en: -What are you doing? -The evidence report on the Kim case.
translation.zh: -你在干什么？-写金姆案的证据报告

translation.en: Which I did already.
translation.zh: 我已经写完了

translation.en: I'm fixing some spelling mistakes, so it doesn't get kicked back.
translation.zh: 我在修改拼写错误 这样不会被退回

translation.en: You’re kidding me, right?
translation.zh: 你开玩笑的是吧？

translation.en: Don't put anything past a good defense lawyer.
translation.zh: 别让辩护律师抓到任何把柄

translation.en: -Hey, Tyndall. Guess what. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -廷德尔-怎么？ 你猜怎么着？这位新人在修改我的拼写错误

translation.en: Newbie is fixing my spelling.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？这位新人在修改我的拼写错误

translation.en: Too bad he can't fix your tie.
translation.zh: 可惜他不能帮你整理领带

translation.en: Hey. How's my sign language?
translation.zh: 看我的手语

translation.en: Oh, that’s clear. Who's working the Christopher Wallace case?
translation.zh: 意思很明确 谁负责克里斯托弗华莱士的案子？

translation.en: Biggie Smalls? The rapper? Got shot outside the Petersen Museum?
translation.zh: 也叫比基斯莫兹 死于彼得森博物馆外的说唱歌手

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Uh, Wilshire Division, I think. Why?
translation.zh: 他啊 是威尔夏分局负责 怎么？

translation.en: Isn't it a case we should be working?
translation.zh: 这不是本部门该负责的案件吗？

translation.en: No, that’s like gangster, rapper, drive-by bullshit.
translation.zh: 不 那案子是匪帮说唱歌手遭遇驾车枪击

translation.en: -Miller, Poole. You're up. -What have we got, Lieutenant?
translation.zh: -米勒、普尔 你们出现场-什么案子 警督？

translation.en: Officer involved shooting. North Hollywood.
translation.zh: 警官开枪案件 在北好莱坞

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Shooter was Detective Frank Lyga.
translation.zh: 开枪人是弗兰克莱加警探

translation.en: Undercover narco working out of Hollywood Division.
translation.zh: 好莱坞分局的卧底缉毒探员

translation.en: -I talked with him personally. -We'll do an interview.
translation.zh: 我和他谈过 我们会自己讯问莱加

translation.en: -He'll tell you what he told me. -Which is what?
translation.zh: -他对你也会那样说-怎么说？

translation.en: This asshole gangster rolled up on him. They had words, guy had a gun.
translation.zh: 那个黑帮分子先挑衅 他们发生口角 那人有枪莱加拔枪更快

translation.en: Lyga was faster.
translation.zh: 他们发生口角 那人有枪莱加拔枪更快

translation.en: How do we know our victim was a gangster?
translation.zh: 怎么知道死者是黑帮分子？

translation.en: -Lyga said he was flashing signs. -Piru? Bloods?
translation.zh: -莱加说他做了黑帮手势-赤血帮的？

translation.en: -What Lyga said. -Anyone touch anything?
translation.zh: -莱加是这么说的-现场被保护了吗？

translation.en: Only paramedics. The scene is secure.
translation.zh: 只有急救员来过 现场没有人接近

translation.en: Smith & Wesson 9mm. Doesn’t look like it’s been fired.
translation.zh: 史密斯威森九毫米口径貌似未开过火

translation.en: Lyga was too fast for this piece of shit.
translation.zh: 我说了莱加的拔枪速度比那个烂人快

translation.en: Do we have a name?
translation.zh: 知道名字了吗？

translation.en: -I just told you. Shit, Piece Of. -Sergeant.
translation.zh: 我说了 烂人 警长

translation.en: Not yet. Vehicle’s registered to the office of a Sharitha Knight.
translation.zh: 还不是警长 车辆登记信息显示车主是夏丽萨奈特的公司

translation.en: What about security cameras? Is the shooting on tape?
translation.zh: 有监控录像吗？拍到开枪经过了吗？

translation.en: -Cameras only capture the inside. -Of course they do.
translation.zh: 摄像头只拍加油站里面 自然如此

translation.en: Any witnesses that can back up with Lyga says?
translation.zh: 有目击者吗？有人能证明莱加的话吗？

translation.en: We haven't found one who’s seen the whole thing, but I mean...
translation.zh: 还没找到目击整个经过的人 但莱加是警察

translation.en: Come on, Lyga's a cop.
translation.zh: 但莱加是警察

translation.en: Who shot someone.
translation.zh: 开枪射杀别人的警察

translation.en: How's your spelling? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你的拼写水平怎么样？

translation.en: Got a wallet.
translation.zh: 有钱包

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: [Miller] Who is he?
translation.zh: 他是谁？

translation.en: [Poole] Kevin Gaines.
translation.zh: 凯文盖恩斯

translation.en: And he’s one of ours, too.
translation.zh: 他也是警察

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -Amanda? -Right away, sir.
translation.zh: -阿曼达？-马上放好 长官

translation.en: -Hello. -It's goddamn freezing in here.
translation.zh: -你好-这里冷死了

translation.en: -Someone call maintenance again. -Yeah, good luck with that.
translation.zh: -快叫维修人员来修-祝你好运

translation.en: Come on. I'll show you the case files.
translation.zh: 来吧 我给你看看相关卷宗

translation.en: -Are you shitting me? -What did you expect?
translation.zh: -你玩我呢？-你以为会怎样？

translation.en: That’s a decade of work. Plus we got the lawsuit. Case is a monster.
translation.zh: 十年的积累 外加最近诉讼的资料 这是个大案

translation.en: I'm going to need help and a place to work.
translation.zh: 我需要帮手 还有工作场所

translation.en: You're looking at it.
translation.zh: 这里就是

translation.en: -Are you serious? -Well, at least you got some privacy.
translation.zh: -不会吧？-至少这里保密性很好

translation.en: I’m going to need people, a whole team of people.
translation.zh: 我需要人手 很多人手

translation.en: It'll take weeks to go through everything.
translation.zh: 光熟悉资料就得好几周

translation.en: Relax. Truth is, you can have whatever you want except for one thing.
translation.zh: 别紧张 你想要的都会给你除了一件事

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: You can't talk to anybody in the lawsuit against the department.
translation.zh: 你不能跟涉及警局被诉案的人谈话

translation.en: -Meaning Russell Poole. -Or Voletta Wallace.
translation.zh: -也就是罗素普尔-还有瓦莱塔华莱士

translation.en: Tell me about Mr. Poole.
translation.zh: 跟我说说普尔先生

translation.en: You worked with him. His whole conspiracy thing...
translation.zh: 你和他共事过 他的那套阴谋论

translation.en: Hm? You buy it?
translation.zh: 你相信吗？

translation.en: Russell Poole’s a good man, a good cop.
translation.zh: 罗素普尔是个好人 是个好警察

translation.en: He believed what he believed and...
translation.zh: 他对认定的事坚定不移

translation.en: It's up to you figure out if he was right.
translation.zh: 至于他是对是错 要由你来判断

translation.en: Can you believe this shit? Two cops. One black.
translation.zh: 这叫什么事？ 两方都是警察一个是黑人 另一个像是要去

translation.en: The other one looks like the goddamn Aryan Brotherhood.
translation.zh: 两方都是警察一个是黑人 另一个像是要去 参加亚利安兄弟会黑帮海选

translation.en: No good witnesses, no surveillance footage.
translation.zh: 没有目击者 没有监控录像

translation.en: We have a shit show.
translation.zh: 这是个烫手山芋

translation.en: Lyga's interview was solid. A good shooting is a good shooting.
translation.zh: 莱加的证词很有力 如果是合理开枪 就没问题

translation.en: You’re seriously that naive? Who the hell sponsored you for R.H.D.?
translation.zh: 你真是幼稚到家了谁把你调到抢劫凶案组的？

translation.en: -I'm not naive. -You know what people think
translation.zh: 我不幼稚 你知道民众对警局的看法吗？

translation.en: -about the department? -They're wrong.
translation.zh: 你知道民众对警局的看法吗？ 知道 但他们错了

translation.en: Okay, so wait, because Gaines is going to be the victim.
translation.zh: 盖恩斯会成为黑人受害者

translation.en: We're the white cops covering everything up. Good luck telling your kids
translation.zh: 我们将会成为掩盖罪行的白人警察 你可以试试告诉你的孩子们其他人都是错的

translation.en: -how wrong everyone else is. -My kids don't even...
translation.zh: 你可以试试告诉你的孩子们其他人都是错的 我的孩子们根本…

translation.en: You know what? We do everything by the book, we'll be okay.
translation.zh: 只要我们按规定办案就问心无愧

translation.en: -Come on. -Where we going?
translation.zh: -走吧-去哪？

translation.en: Lyga said Gaines flashed gang signs.
translation.zh: 莱加说盖恩斯比过黑帮手势

translation.en: The car Gaines was driving was registered to Sharitha Knight.
translation.zh: 而盖恩斯开的车是夏丽萨奈特的

translation.en: -Mean anything to you? -No.
translation.zh: -这说明什么？-不知道

translation.en: She's married to Suge Knight. I checked.
translation.zh: 她丈夫是苏格奈特 我查过了

translation.en: "Death Row" Suge Knight?
translation.zh: 死囚唱片公司的苏格奈特？

translation.en: I want to know why a police officer would be driving Suge Knight's wife's car.
translation.zh: 我想知道为什么一位警官会开着 苏格奈特妻子的车

translation.en: Can I finish my burger at least? It's Tommy's.
translation.zh: 我能吃完汉堡再走吗？这可是汤米汉堡

translation.en: [Sharitha] Kevin was my boyfriend.
translation.zh: 凯文是我的男朋友

translation.en: Did you know he was married and had a family?
translation.zh: 你知道他已婚有家庭吗？

translation.en: -Technically, I'm married too. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 理论上我也已婚有家庭

translation.en: Kevin and I weren't doing anything behind anyone's back if you're asking.
translation.zh: 但凯文和我是光明正大在一起 若你想暗示的是这个

translation.en: How did you two meet?
translation.zh: 你们怎么认识的？

translation.en: -What does that have to do with anything? -Doing our job.
translation.zh: -这和案子有关吗？-只是照例问问 夫人

translation.en: The only thing you're doing is trying to turn this into something it isn't.
translation.zh: 你们只想颠倒黑白

translation.en: Coming to see me because I'm married to Suge, trying to protect one of your own.
translation.zh: 来找我是因为我丈夫是苏格 你们只想保护白人警察

translation.en: Mrs. Knight, that is not the case. I promise you.
translation.zh: 奈特夫人 不是这样的 我向你保证

translation.en: You promise me?
translation.zh: 你向我保证？

translation.en: Kevin and I met out one night. He was handsome, flashy.
translation.zh: 凯文和我某天晚上偶遇他英俊、光鲜

translation.en: Couldn't believe he was a cop.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信他是个警察

translation.en: We're not flashy?
translation.zh: 我们不光鲜？

translation.en: -I told him who I was. -Mm. Suge Knight's wife.
translation.zh: -我告诉了他我的身份-苏格奈特的妻子

translation.en: Suge and I haven't been together for a long time.
translation.zh: 苏格和我已经分居很久

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Even before he went to prison, our marriage was just a piece of paper.
translation.zh: 即使在他入狱前我们的婚姻也不过剩一张纸而已

translation.en: I got my own thing going. I manage my own artists.
translation.zh: 我有自己的事业我旗下有自己的艺人

translation.en: -Kevin even worked for me once. -Oh. Uh, what did he do?
translation.zh: 凯文甚至还为我工作过 他做什么？

translation.en: He did security for Snoop at a family reunion he was having.
translation.zh: 为史努比的一次家庭聚会当过保安

translation.en: -Snoop Dogg? -No, Snoopy.
translation.zh: -说唱歌手史努比狗狗？-不 是那只动画狗

translation.en: Uh, Mrs. Knight, did... did Kevin and Suge know each other?
translation.zh: 奈特夫人 凯文和苏格彼此认识吗？

translation.en: They met. I told you we weren't hiding anything.
translation.zh: 他们见过我刚才说了 我们没有偷偷摸摸

translation.en: Kevin wasn't worried about what Suge would think?
translation.zh: 凯文不担心苏格的看法吗？

translation.en: I mean, your husband does have a reputation.
translation.zh: 你丈夫毕竟名声不太好

translation.en: Kevin wasn't afraid of anyone. He was a man... like Suge.
translation.zh: 凯文谁也不怕他是个真男人 和苏格一样

translation.en: Hm. So they respected each other.
translation.zh: 也就是说他们尊重彼此

translation.en: What are you trying to ask me?
translation.zh: 你到底想说什么？

translation.en: Mrs. Knight, to the best of your knowledge...
translation.zh: 奈特夫人 据你所知

translation.en: ...was Kevin... was Officer Gaines a gang member?
translation.zh: 凯文…盖恩斯警官是黑帮分子吗？

translation.en: Get out of my house.
translation.zh: 滚出我家

translation.en: ...is that there is no question that Iraq continues its pattern of non-cooperation.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 伊拉克继续采取不合作态度…

translation.en: -[Greg] I get it. I get it. -[Daryn] Gregers.
translation.zh: -我知道-格雷格

translation.en: -I’ll see you. -Dupers.
translation.zh: 回头聊 杜普雷

translation.en: -How are you, my man? -Good. Let’s go talk.
translation.zh: -你好吗 兄弟？-很好 咱们去聊聊

translation.en: Look at you, making those sleeves work.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你 大侦探指挥手下啊

translation.en: They’re pulling me onto another task force.
translation.zh: 他们调我去办另一个案子

translation.en: This one’s out of Robbery Homicide.
translation.zh: 归抢劫凶案组

translation.en: It’s a cold case.
translation.zh: 是个悬案

translation.en: That's great, R.H.D. Shit, good for you, man.
translation.zh: 很牛啊 抢劫凶案组 真不错

translation.en: I want you to join me.
translation.zh: 我想让你来帮我

translation.en: Oh, come on, man.
translation.zh: 别逗了 你也知道我的情况

translation.en: You know the deal. I appreciate whatever it is you're trying to do here,
translation.zh: 别逗了 你也知道我的情况 感激你对兄弟的提携

translation.en: but I'm never going to get out of this uniform.
translation.zh: 但我只能当制服警员

translation.en: I'm never going to make it over to Robbery Homicide.
translation.zh: 绝不可能升到抢劫凶案组

translation.en: You don't understand. They're giving me whatever I need and what I need is you.
translation.zh: 你没明白 我不管要谁他们都会给我 而我最需要你

translation.en: -Don’t do that. -Don’t do what?
translation.zh: -别这样-别怎样？

translation.en: Don't make promises only to have my suspension come up.
translation.zh: 别乱许愿 到时候又扯出我停职的事

translation.en: It doesn't matter. If you want in, you're in.
translation.zh: 你停职的事没关系的你要是想加入 就能加入

translation.en: What's the case?
translation.zh: 什么案子？

translation.en: Biggie Smalls.
translation.zh: 比基斯莫兹

translation.en: -Now you're just messing with me. -No.
translation.zh: -你又开玩笑-没有

translation.en: -'Cause you know how I feel-- -Daryn, I’m serious.
translation.zh: -你知道我对…-达林 我认真的

translation.en: -No bullshit? -No bullshit.
translation.zh: -没骗人？-没骗人

translation.en: Hey, it’s time for you learn how fun it is to be a cop again.
translation.zh: 你该重温一下当警察的乐趣了

translation.en: Damn.
translation.zh: 真想不到

translation.en: -Biggie. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 比基的案子

translation.en: Biggie Smalls is the illest. You don’t know nothing about that.
translation.zh: -比基斯莫兹是…-最棒的 你根本不懂

translation.en: -[indistinct chattering] -[Dan] Relax! [laughs]
translation.zh: 你就放心吧！

translation.en: Yo, listen. Big, he coming.
translation.zh: 听我说 比基 他一定会来

translation.en: All right, 'cause I will have punk fire that ass, nigga.
translation.zh: 那我一定高兴死了

translation.en: What you tell me you want to do when you got to L.A.?
translation.zh: 你当初说到了洛杉矶想做什么事？

translation.en: -Get some chronic, go to Roscoe's... -And get up with Pac.
translation.zh: -吸强效大麻 去罗斯科餐厅吃饭-和图帕克见面

translation.en: Exactly. Done the two already, so stop doubtin'.
translation.zh: 没错 前两件都实现了还不相信我的能力？

translation.en: Now you got to go three for three. Get the hat trick and you can suck my...
translation.zh: 你得把第三件也实现才行 不然你就等着舔我的…

translation.en: -What I tell you? -What up? What’s up? What’s up?
translation.zh: -我怎么说的？-兄弟们好啊

translation.en: [Dan] Let’s move.
translation.zh: 过去吧

translation.en: Man, he got the SL 500, son.
translation.zh: 他这辆是奔驰SL500

translation.en: [chuckles] What up, Big?
translation.zh: 你好啊 纽约人比基

translation.en: Look at this New York nigga, 95 degrees, wearing this big-ass coat.
translation.zh: 你好啊 纽约人比基 35度的气温还穿着厚外套

translation.en: That’s right, 'cause B.I.G. stay fly.
translation.zh: 是啊 因为比基一直这么有范儿

translation.en: Uh-huh. Biggie Smalls. That’s right, that shit be classy.
translation.zh: -比基斯莫兹-没错 这外号很不错

translation.en: [laughs] Check it out. I’m doing this movie right now
translation.zh: 听着 我正在拍一部电影

translation.en: and I cannot stop playing your song on set.
translation.zh: 总是在片场放你的歌

translation.en: ♪ Party and bullshit And party and bullshit ♪
translation.zh: 派对和瞎混 派对和瞎混

translation.en: -All right. -You know my shit?
translation.zh: -很棒-你听我的歌？

translation.en: What’d I just say? I'm driving people crazy with this song!
translation.zh: 我刚才说了 其他工作人员快被我逼疯了

translation.en: "Uh, Mr. Tupac. Can you turn down the music, please?
translation.zh: “图帕克先生 能请你把音乐调低音量也别再抽大麻了好吗？”

translation.en: -Stop smoking that marijuana.” -[laughter]
translation.zh: 能请你把音乐调低音量也别再抽大麻了好吗？”

translation.en: -I’m just trying to be like you, G. -Oh, come on.
translation.zh: -我只是想成为你这样的歌手-别这么谦虚

translation.en: -Going to my house later. Want to come? -You got liquor and weed, I’m your man.
translation.zh: 晚上来我家玩吧？ 只要有酒和大麻 我一定到

translation.en: -You know the answer to that, baby. -I know it.
translation.zh: -你知道答案 兄弟-我知道

translation.en: -Let’s move. -My man.
translation.zh: -走吧-兄弟

translation.en: What a fucking nightmare. Gaines' family already hired Johnnie Cochran.
translation.zh: 真是倒霉到家了 盖恩斯的家人雇了强尼柯克伦当律师

translation.en: What'd I tell you? It’s a shit show.
translation.zh: 我说的没错吧？这是个烫手山芋

translation.en: -We've done everything by the book... -Would you stop with that crap?
translation.zh: 警督 流程都符合规定 而且我们会继续遵守各种规定 你能不能别再说废话 那些都不重要

translation.en: It doesn’t matter.
translation.zh: 你能不能别再说废话 那些都不重要

translation.en: Kevin Gaines was a bad cop.
translation.zh: 凯文盖恩斯是个腐败警察

translation.en: Because Lyga said so?
translation.zh: 因为莱加这么说？

translation.en: -Without proof, Cochran will destroy him. -And then he’ll to destroy us.
translation.zh: 没有证据的话柯克伦会让他身败名裂 然后让我们身败名裂

translation.en: It's not about what Lyga said. Lieutenant, hear me out. I.A. had a file on Gaines.
translation.zh: 这和莱加的证词没关系 警督听我说 内务部有盖恩斯的黑材料

translation.en: He was involved in three other road-rage incidents while off-duty.
translation.zh: 他涉及三起下班时间的路怒事件

translation.en: I take it none resulted in a homicide?
translation.zh: 结果都没死人吧

translation.en: He had a receipt for a $1,000 steak dinner in his wallet.
translation.zh: 拜托 他的钱夹里 有一张一千美元的牛排用餐收据

translation.en: He had a Mercedes. He wore Versace shirts to work.
translation.zh: 他名下有一辆奔驰车还穿着范思哲的衣服上班

translation.en: -He did all that on a cop's salary? -Poole--
translation.zh: -警察的薪水能买得起吗？-普尔…

translation.en: He was driving Suge Knight's wife's car.
translation.zh: 他死时开的是苏格奈特妻子的车

translation.en: She said Gaines knew Knight. What if Gaines was working for him off-duty?
translation.zh: 她承认盖恩斯认识奈特 盖恩斯会不会下班后为他工作呢？

translation.en: He flashed gang signs. Piru, the same gang Knight’s associated with.
translation.zh: 莱加说他做了黑帮手势 赤血帮的 正是奈特所在的帮派

translation.en: I don't care.
translation.zh: 这些我不在乎

translation.en: And from now on, you don’t care either.
translation.zh: 从现在开始 你也不许在乎

translation.en: We're not going to get a white cop off
translation.zh: 我们不能靠给被杀的黑人警察抹黑

translation.en: by dirtying up the black cop he killed. Do you understand me?
translation.zh: 来给白人警察脱罪 -你明白吗？-我没有抹黑任何人

translation.en: -I'm not dirty up anybody. -Detective! Do you understand me?
translation.zh: -你明白吗？-我没有抹黑任何人 警探 你听懂我的话了吗？

translation.en: You two guys go home, check on your families...
translation.zh: 你俩都回家跟家人团聚一下

translation.en: ...and then put your energy into finding me a credible witness
translation.zh: 然后全力寻找能证实加莱说法的…

translation.en: that’ll back up Lyga's story.
translation.zh: 可靠目击者

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Preferably a black one.
translation.zh: -是 长官-最好是黑人

translation.en: -Every credit-card receipt? -Up to, during and after the shooting.
translation.zh: 所有的信用卡单据？ 是的 枪击案之前过程中和之后的都要

translation.en: You guys already talked to all the customers that were here.
translation.zh: 但你们的人已经找当时在场的所有顾客问过话了

translation.en: I didn't.
translation.zh: 我还没有

translation.en: I thought the, uh...
translation.zh: 我还以为…

translation.en: the cameras only recorded the inside of this place.
translation.zh: 我还以为摄像头只拍加油站内部

translation.en: I was told the cameras didn't record the exterior of the station.
translation.zh: 枪击案那天我被告知监控摄像头不拍摄 加油站外面

translation.en: Not by me. Somebody must have just gotten confused or something.
translation.zh: 不是我说的 肯定有人弄错了

translation.en: Yeah, or not followed through. Do you know if there's footage from that day
translation.zh: 或者没有跟进查实 你知道那天是否拍到

translation.en: showing the outside of the station? Possibly even the shooting itself, sir?
translation.zh: 加油站外面的视频了吗？ 可能拍到了枪击经过

translation.en: Sir, is there video or not?
translation.zh: 那天是否拍到了视频？

translation.en: Look, I was told not to give it to anyone.
translation.zh: 我奉命不能给任何人

translation.en: By who? The owner.
translation.zh: -奉谁的命？-店主

translation.en: He said that Johnnie Cochran is coming to get it. So, I guess it's valuable.
translation.zh: 他说强尼柯克伦要来取 肯定卖了不少钱

translation.en: No, it's evidence. Give it to me right now.
translation.zh: 不 这是案件证据 马上给我

translation.en: -But I could lose my job. -Hey.
translation.zh: -但我会丢掉工作-马上给我

translation.en: Right now. Or I arrest you for obstruction of justice.
translation.zh: -但我会丢掉工作-马上给我 不然我以妨碍司法公正罪名逮捕你

translation.en: Not even Johnnie Cochran will be able to defend you.
translation.zh: 就算是强尼柯克伦也救不了你

translation.en: Now.
translation.zh: 马上

translation.en: What does this show?
translation.zh: 拍到了什么？

translation.en: It’s what the white cop said.
translation.zh: 和白人警察说的一样

translation.en: My God. You're a terrible shot.
translation.zh: 天啊 你的枪法真烂

translation.en: I'm not a cop anymore. What's your excuse?
translation.zh: 我不再是警察了 你的借口是什么？

translation.en: I don’t need to carry a weapon. I use my head instead.
translation.zh: 我不需要携带武器 而是用脑子办案

translation.en: Oh, but I need practice because you're not going to be around much.
translation.zh: 但我需要练习因为你不在身边保护我

translation.en: Is that what you're trying to tell me?
translation.zh: 你是想表达这个吗？

translation.en: No, I thought this would be a fun thing to do. You know, just like old times.
translation.zh: 不是 我只是觉得练射击很好玩 就像以前一样

translation.en: Look, Donna, this is Biggie Smalls. This case is legendary.
translation.zh: 听着 唐娜 这是比基斯莫兹的命案 是传奇案件

translation.en: And it’s been ten years. I want to be the cop that can finally solve this thing.
translation.zh: 而且是十年的悬案 我想当破这种案子的警察

translation.en: I can't say no.
translation.zh: 我没法拒绝

translation.en: I'm not asking you to say no. When have I ever done that?
translation.zh: 我没说让你拒绝我干过那样的事吗？

translation.en: I know. I just...
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是…

translation.en: To tell you the truth, I'm a little jealous.
translation.zh: 说实话 我有点小嫉妒

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: ♪ Biggie, Biggie, Biggie, can't you see Sometimes your words just... ♪
translation.zh: 比基 你难道不明白有时你会把我说晕

translation.en: Please stop. Please stop. Please stop.
translation.zh: 好了 别唱了

translation.en: Look, hey. We’re going to make it work.
translation.zh: 听着 我们能搞定

translation.en: We will.
translation.zh: -我们能-好吧？

translation.en: -All right? -Or I’m going to shoot you.
translation.zh: -我们能-好吧？ 否则我会对你开枪

translation.en: -You’re going to shoot me? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你会对我开枪？-对

translation.en: You’re not going to shoot me. You’d miss. You would miss.
translation.zh: 你不会对我开枪 你打不中我

translation.en: -Such an ass. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: And last, but certainly not least,
translation.zh: 最后 我要说

translation.en: I think we all owe a round of applause to Detective Poole.
translation.zh: 我们都欠普尔警探一次热烈的掌声

translation.en: Through determination, solid police work and a complete lack of sleep,
translation.zh: 他靠坚定的决心 扎实的调查以及不眠不休的劲头

translation.en: it looks like he's put an end to the Kevin Gaines-Frank Lyga nightmare.
translation.zh: 让凯文盖恩斯-弗兰克莱加这个烫手山芋完美收官

translation.en: Didn't I tell you how much I love this guy? He is the best partner ever.
translation.zh: 我没说过我有多爱他吗 警督？ 他是世界上最棒的搭档

translation.en: -[laughter] -The department thanks you,
translation.zh: 警局感谢你 洛杉矶市政府感谢你

translation.en: the City of Los Angeles thanks you and I thank you.
translation.zh: 警局感谢你 洛杉矶市政府感谢你 我本人感谢你

translation.en: Okay, everybody, let’s go to work. Miller, Poole, my office.
translation.zh: 好了 大家去工作吧米勒、普尔 来我办公室

translation.en: -Guess he wants to kiss you in private. -[sniggers]
translation.zh: 看来他想私下亲你

translation.en: -Congratulations. -Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: -恭喜你-谢谢 长官

translation.en: So, uh, what now, Lieutenant?
translation.zh: 有什么指示 警督？

translation.en: Well, the shooting board gets the last word,
translation.zh: 最终要看枪击调查小组的结论

translation.en: but the tape will definitely help clear Lyga.
translation.zh: 但监控录像肯定能证明莱加的清白

translation.en: -And Gaines? -What about Gaines? He's dead.
translation.zh: 那盖恩斯呢？ 盖恩斯怎么了？他已经死了

translation.en: -Well, I know, but he-- -Look, if Gaines is as shady as you think,
translation.zh: -我知道 但是他…-如果盖恩斯如你说的那么腐败

translation.en: then it's up to I.A. to do something about it.
translation.zh: 调查他是内务部的事

translation.en: But they probably won't because again, he's dead.
translation.zh: 但他们应该不会调查因为他已经死了

translation.en: So, we're back in rotation?
translation.zh: 所以我们继续日常工作？

translation.en: -No. You're back up. -What?
translation.zh: -不 你们有新任务-什么？

translation.en: Christopher Wallace. I just got the word.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗华莱士命案我也刚接到通知

translation.en: Are you kidding me? Our reward? We get Biggie?
translation.zh: 不会吧？拿比基的案子犒赏我们？

translation.en: Look, I know it's probably just some gangster thing,
translation.zh: 我知道可能只是黑帮冲突

translation.en: but the murder’s over a month old and the media's making more noise by the day.
translation.zh: 但这案子已经超过一个月 媒体越来越不满

translation.en: -Give it to whoever's up next. -He’s got more gang experience
translation.zh: 轮到谁接案子你给谁就好了 全部门里就数他黑帮案件经验最丰富

translation.en: than anyone in the division. We got to solve this.
translation.zh: 全部门里就数他黑帮案件经验最丰富 我们必须破案

translation.en: I don't care how much gang experience he has, sir.
translation.zh: 我不管他有多少经验 警督 威尔夏分局早该破案了

translation.en: -It's done. It's done. -Anyone.
translation.zh: -已经决定了-那就没人…

translation.en: -[both] Thank you, Lieutenant. -You’re welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢 警督-谢谢 警督 不客气

translation.en: You happy?
translation.zh: 你高兴了？

translation.en: It's the kind of case we should be working.
translation.zh: 我们就该破这种案子

translation.en: And now we are. Hooray.
translation.zh: 如愿了 太好了

translation.en: -What's your take on it? -I don’t know yet.
translation.zh: -你有什么想法？-还不知道

translation.en: Maybe it is just a gang murder.
translation.zh: 也许只是普通黑帮仇杀

translation.en: Maybe it’s the whole East Coast-West Coast music war,
translation.zh: 也许是西岸东岸说唱界的音乐之战

translation.en: with the New York rap artists hating the Los Angeles rap artists.
translation.zh: 纽约的说唱艺术家仇恨洛杉矶的说唱艺术家

translation.en: Jesus Christ, a rap war.
translation.zh: 老天 说唱战争

translation.en: I should be playing golf right now.
translation.zh: 现在我本该在打高尔夫球你知道吗？

translation.en: And do not call them artists.
translation.zh: 不许把他们叫作艺术家

translation.en: They're victims.
translation.zh: 他们是受害人

translation.en: You can’t forget that.
translation.zh: 你不能忘掉这一点

translation.en: I know it's easy to sometimes, but then this is just a job.
translation.zh: 我知道有时候很容易忘掉然后会认为这只是工作

translation.en: I always preferred baseball to golf.
translation.zh: 我一向更喜欢打棒球

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Yeah, I used to dream of going pro. -What happened?
translation.zh: -我还曾想当职业球员-为什么没当？

translation.en: I wasn't good enough. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 球技不够好

translation.en: I did the next best thing and became a cop like my old man.
translation.zh: 于是我选了自己第二擅长的事像父亲一样当了警察

translation.en: -I'm sorry for us both. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 咱俩都挺倒霉

translation.en: Kelly Cooper. I've been leading the Wallace investigation.
translation.zh: 凯利库珀 我负责华莱士命案的调查

translation.en: Poole, Miller, R.H.D., what do you have so far?
translation.zh: 普尔、米勒 抢劫凶案组目前进展如何？

translation.en: Me first.
translation.zh: 我先说

translation.en: So, I guess you guys have had a change of heart, huh?
translation.zh: 看来你们改变心意了？

translation.en: What’s that?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: Well, it almost makes you wonder, uh,
translation.zh: 我很好奇

translation.en: what if it was a white celebrity who got shot?
translation.zh: 如果被杀的名人是个白人会怎样呢？

translation.en: -Christ. -Bruce Springsteen.
translation.zh: -老天-比如布鲁斯史普林斯汀

translation.en: One of the Backstreet Boys.
translation.zh: 或者后街男孩成员

translation.en: How long would it take Homicide Special to take over then? A minute? Maybe two?
translation.zh: 凶案组会在案发多久接手案件？ 一分钟 也许两分钟？

translation.en: You know what? You wanted this investigation, so you enjoy.
translation.zh: 是你想接这个案子的 你好好享受

translation.en: Hey, look. We should've been working this case since day one.
translation.zh: 我知道我们应该一开始就接手

translation.en: We get that but we're here now.
translation.zh: 我明白 但我们已经来了

translation.en: So, why don't you just give us what you have, so we can do what
translation.zh: 不如跟我们说说进展 让我们弥补威尔夏分局的不足

translation.en: Wilshire Division hasn't? After all you have had a month.
translation.zh: 让我们弥补威尔夏分局的不足 你们毕竟已经查了一个月

translation.en: No, you don't know what the hell you're talking about.
translation.zh: 你根本不知道情况

translation.en: So tell us.
translation.zh: 那就告诉我们

translation.en: We want the same thing.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是一致的

translation.en: The victim is one Christopher Wallace,
translation.zh: 死者是克里斯托弗华莱士

translation.en: A.K.A. Biggie Smalls, A.K.A. The Notorious B.I.G.
translation.zh: 外号比基斯莫兹也叫“声名狼藉先生”

translation.en: On March 9th, he was at a party for Vibe Magazine
translation.zh: 3月9日晚 他在彼得森汽车博物馆参加《Vibe》杂志举行的派对

translation.en: at the Petersen Auto Museum.
translation.zh: 他在彼得森汽车博物馆参加《Vibe》杂志举行的派对

translation.en: Wallace was the man of the hour.
translation.zh: 华莱士是当天派对的贵宾

translation.en: In from New York, he held court at a table
translation.zh: 他从纽约专程而来和坏小子唱片公司的

translation.en: with Sean "Puffy" Combs, C.E.O. of Bad Boy Records.
translation.zh: 首席执行官 外号“吹牛老爹”的肖恩科姆斯坐在贵宾区

translation.en: What'd I tell you when we was getting started?
translation.zh: 当初我们刚起步时我怎么跟你说的？

translation.en: On top of the world, baby! On top of the world!
translation.zh: 我们要登上世界之巅！

translation.en: Let's do it, boy!
translation.zh: 大家跳起来！

translation.en: Hey, hey, get my man something...
translation.zh: 快给我兄弟拿酒

translation.en: [Cooper] The event might as well have been an album release party.
translation.zh: 那天也是专辑发行的庆祝派对

translation.en: Life After Death, it just came out.
translation.zh: 《死后生命》专辑刚刚发布

translation.en: Wallace's new album is called Life After Death?
translation.zh: 华莱士的新专辑叫《死后生命》？

translation.en: Crazy, right?
translation.zh: 是不是很诡异？

translation.en: -Heard any of it? -No, I missed it.
translation.zh: -听过吗？-没有

translation.en: -Number one album in the country. -That’s fantastic.
translation.zh: -美国销量第一的专辑-真不错

translation.en: [Cooper] Supposed to be a private event for music and movie types,
translation.zh: 那本该是仅限音乐圈和电影圈人士参加的私人派对

translation.en: but others found their way in.
translation.zh: 但混进去很多无关人等

translation.en: It was overcrowded. There was barely any security
translation.zh: 里面挤满了人 几乎没有安保措施

translation.en: and there were definitely gang members in attendance, both Crips and Bloods.
translation.zh: 绝对有黑帮人员混了进去 瘸子帮和赤血帮的都有

translation.en: What’s up, Big? What up, Puff?
translation.zh: -比基 你好-吹牛老爹 你好

translation.en: [Cooper] Make no mistake, Tupac Shakur was murdered in September.
translation.zh: 虽然图帕克沙库尔九月已被谋杀 苏格奈特正在服刑

translation.en: Suge Knight was in jail, but this East Coast-West Coast bullshit is not over.
translation.zh: 苏格奈特正在服刑 但东岸西岸的匪帮说唱歌手之战并未结束

translation.en: It was a bold move for Puffy and Biggie to come to L.A.
translation.zh: 对于吹牛老爹和比基来说来到洛杉矶是一场冒险

translation.en: The fire marshal shut down the party around midnight,
translation.zh: 午夜时分 消防局叫停了派对

translation.en: but it was so crowded, it took Wallace and Combs
translation.zh: 但由于太过拥挤 华莱士和科姆斯花了半小时

translation.en: another half hour before they got down to the parking garage with their people.
translation.zh: 华莱士和科姆斯花了半小时 才带着人来到停车场

translation.en: -Yo, let's go! -Let’s go, let’s go.
translation.zh: 上车 该走了

translation.en: -Yo, get Biggie in the car, man. -Go. Let’s go.
translation.zh: -快让比基上车-快上车

translation.en: Two Suburbans and one Blazer.
translation.zh: 两辆萨博班 一辆开拓者

translation.en: Combs got in the first Suburban with his bodyguards.
translation.zh: 科姆斯和他的保镖们上了第一辆萨博班

translation.en: Let’s go, man.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Wallace and his guys got in the second.
translation.zh: 华莱士和保镖们上了第二辆

translation.en: We'll see you at the next party.
translation.zh: 下次派对见

translation.en: -Yo, Ma, bring some food. -I got you. Fatburger.
translation.zh: -下次带点吃的来-没问题 给你带汉堡

translation.en: [Cooper] The third car, the Blazer, was driven by Reggie Blaylock, Inglewood P.D.
translation.zh: 第三辆车 也就是开拓者 司机是雷吉布雷洛克英格尔伍德警局的

translation.en: A cop was in the caravan?
translation.zh: 他们的车队里有个警察？

translation.en: He was moonlighting. He was riding with the Head of Bad Boy Security.
translation.zh: 是他的夜间兼职 他和坏小子唱片公司的安保主任一起在第三辆车

translation.en: Watch this nigga here. Who’s this nigga here?
translation.zh: 盯紧这个人 他是谁？

translation.en: -Come on, man. -[yelling]
translation.zh: 别闹了

translation.en: [Dan] Move, man!
translation.zh: 让路！

translation.en: Running his shit. Running it high.
translation.zh: 再不走就轧死他

translation.en: -[man] Run and shit. Yeah, bro. -[Dan] Run and shit.
translation.zh: -这家伙是谁？-轧死他 -轧死他-快滚

translation.en: [Cooper] They pulled out of the parking garage and headed North on Fairfax.
translation.zh: （威尔夏大道） 他们离开停车场向北往费尔法克斯方向行驶

translation.en: [Dan] Get in the car, man.
translation.zh: 快点上车

translation.en: [Cooper] The first Suburban made the light on Wilshire.
translation.zh: 第一辆萨博班抢黄灯通过了威尔夏大道的路口

translation.en: The second one, the one with Wallace riding shotgun, didn't.
translation.zh: 第二辆被红灯拦下华莱士坐在副驾驶座上

translation.en: Car number three, the Blazer driven by Officer Blaylock was pulling up the rear
translation.zh: 第三辆车 由布雷洛克警官驾驶的开拓者殿后

translation.en: when a white SUV tried to get between the second Suburban and the Blazer.
translation.zh: 突然出现一辆白色SUV试图插进第二辆萨博班和开拓者之间

translation.en: [Story] Move, man.
translation.zh: 让路

translation.en: As Blaylock cut off the white SUV, he saw a black or possibly green Chevy Impala
translation.zh: 布雷洛克挡住白色SUV的去路 他看到一辆黑色或绿色的雪佛兰英帕拉

translation.en: pull up on the passenger side of the Suburban.
translation.zh: 停在了萨博班的副驾驶一侧

translation.en: -[man] Yo, somebody’s shooting! -[tires screech]
translation.zh: 有人在开枪

translation.en: [Cooper] The shooter took off and headed east on Wilshire in the Impala.
translation.zh: 枪手乘坐英帕拉沿着威尔夏大道向东逃走

translation.en: Blaylock gave chase in the Blazer, but couldn't catch up.
translation.zh: 布雷洛克驾驶开拓者进行追赶但并未追上

translation.en: -[man] Yo, Big! -[indistinct yelling]
translation.zh: 比基！

translation.en: [Puffy] Big! Big!
translation.zh: 比基！

translation.en: -[man 1] That’s Biggie. That’s Biggie. -[man 2] Who got Big?
translation.zh: -比基中枪了-谁开的枪？

translation.en: -[Puffy] Call 9-1-1. No, Big. -[indistinct yelling]
translation.zh: -快报警-不 比基！

translation.en: Fuck! Fuck!
translation.zh: 混蛋！

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 混蛋！

translation.en: [Cooper] Wallace never regained consciousness.
translation.zh: 华莱士再也没有醒来

translation.en: Was pronounced dead at Cedars at 1:15 a.m.
translation.zh: 于凌晨1点15分在西达赛奈医院被宣告死亡

translation.en: Okay. Fire away.
translation.zh: 好了 提问吧

translation.en: Okay, Wallace was the only target.
translation.zh: 能确定华莱士是唯一的目标吗？

translation.en: -There's no question about that? -Shooter looked right at him and fired.
translation.zh: 能确定华莱士是唯一的目标吗？ 枪手停下车 直视他 然后开枪

translation.en: -And the Impala? -Late model Super Sport.
translation.zh: 那辆英帕拉呢？ 是最新型的超跑有多个目击者能够证实

translation.en: -Multiple witnesses confirmed. -But they’re not sure about the color.
translation.zh: 是最新型的超跑有多个目击者能够证实 但他们不确定颜色？

translation.en: Conflicting reports. Some said black. Some say green.
translation.zh: 证词不一致有人说是黑色 有人说是绿色

translation.en: All we know for sure was that it was dark.
translation.zh: 我们只能确定是深色

translation.en: Okay, what about that white S.U.V.? What do we...
translation.zh: 那辆白色SUV呢？有什么线索？

translation.en: -What’s the story there? -We don't know.
translation.zh: 那辆白色SUV呢？有什么线索？ 不知道

translation.en: For physical evidence, we got slugs, casings, Gecko 9mm.
translation.zh: 物证方面我们有子弹和弹壳是盖克公司产的九毫米子弹

translation.en: What about the composite? We’ve actually got two composites. [clears throat]
translation.zh: -模拟画像呢？-我们有两张画像

translation.en: Farrakhan was the shooter?
translation.zh: -法拉堪是凶手？-你真幽默

translation.en: -That's funny. -These don't look like the same guy.
translation.zh: -法拉堪是凶手？-你真幽默 -这根本是不同的两个人-情况是这样

translation.en: Hey, listen. At least we got something to work with.
translation.zh: -这根本是不同的两个人-情况是这样 至少我们有了能调查的素材

translation.en: Most of the witnesses we talked to were either uncooperative,
translation.zh: 大部分目击者要么不配合

translation.en: or suddenly developed memory loss. You know how it goes on the street, right?
translation.zh: 要么突然失忆 你也知道街头群众的风格

translation.en: Especially when Suge Knight might be involved.
translation.zh: 尤其苏格奈特可能涉案时

translation.en: -Knight, from prison? -That doesn't mean anything.
translation.zh: -奈特在牢里涉案？-完全不耽误

translation.en: If he’s a godfather, yeah, maybe, but he’s a thug and he’s a lucky thug.
translation.zh: 如果他是教父型人物 也许能行但他只是个走运的匪帮分子

translation.en: Your theory is Knight had Biggie killed by the Bloods to get revenge for Tupac?
translation.zh: 这是你的推理？ 奈特为了给图帕克报仇指使赤血帮杀了比基？

translation.en: That's the most obvious one, but we don't have any leads that back it up.
translation.zh: 这是最显而易见的 但我们找不到支持的线索

translation.en: Latest tip we’ve got actually points to a Crip.
translation.zh: 最新得到的线索指向瘸子帮

translation.en: A Crip?
translation.zh: 瘸子帮成员？

translation.en: Duane Keith Davis, A.K.A. Keefe D.
translation.zh: 杜恩基思戴维斯 外号基弗

translation.en: He doesn't look like either.
translation.zh: 他长得不像画像

translation.en: And, uh, the only witnesses who saw the shooter,
translation.zh: 仅有少数目击者看到杀手

translation.en: they didn't pick Keefe out of a six-pack.
translation.zh: 他们没能从六位候选人中认出基弗

translation.en: But there's something about this guy.
translation.zh: 但他绝对有嫌疑

translation.en: Okay, what's the motive?
translation.zh: 他有什么动机？

translation.en: -Unpaid security work. -Huh!
translation.zh: 做过保安但没拿到工钱

translation.en: Where’d you get that tip from?
translation.zh: 这个线索哪来的？

translation.en: Confidential source.
translation.zh: 保密线人

translation.en: A month you worked on this case and all you have is a bullshit tip?
translation.zh: 你们忙乎了一个月只得到这条破线索？

translation.en: Hey, Keefe D. was at the party and he was seen at Wallace's table.
translation.zh: 基弗当时在派对现场 有人看到他去找华莱士说话

translation.en: -We know that. And he lawyered up. -All right, we’ll follow it.
translation.zh: 有人看到他去找华莱士说话 -而且他请了律师-好的 我们会追查

translation.en: Yeah, it was nice work.
translation.zh: 你们干得真棒

translation.en: Hey. Look.
translation.zh: 听我说

translation.en: Nobody is expecting you to understand this shit.
translation.zh: 没人指望你们能搞明白

translation.en: I mean, look, I barely understand it.
translation.zh: 我基本完全搞不懂

translation.en: -But this case... -We'll close it.
translation.zh: 但这个案子… 我们会破案

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 多谢

translation.en: -Damn. -Yeah. Ten years leads to a lot of paper.
translation.zh: -见鬼-是啊 十年下来积累了好多文件

translation.en: But at least we got this great office to work in, right?
translation.zh: 至少我们的办公室很棒 对吧？

translation.en: -We can't do this on our own. -I know.
translation.zh: -我们两人搞不定这些-我知道

translation.en: Department’s got to come strong. The year that he was killed,
translation.zh: 警局得加把劲才行啊 比基遇害那年他卖掉了五百万张专辑

translation.en: Biggie sold five million albums.
translation.zh: 比基遇害那年他卖掉了五百万张专辑

translation.en: For us not to make an arrest after he got shot in public?
translation.zh: 他当众被枪杀警方却连个嫌犯都没有？

translation.en: I don't care if our people are involved. Shit's embarrassing.
translation.zh: 不管是不是有警员涉案 -都够丢脸的-达林

translation.en: Daryn. I know. It's going to take a task force, a kickass one.
translation.zh: 我知道 破这个案子需要一个精英级别的专案组

translation.en: But I promise you, the department will make this right.
translation.zh: 但我向你保证 警局一定会全力支持

translation.en: I went to you first because I didn’t want your feelings hurt.
translation.zh: 我先找了你 是因为我不想让你伤心

translation.en: -You're an asshole. -I know.
translation.zh: 你是个混蛋

translation.en: Let’s get to work while we don't listen to Biggie.
translation.zh: 我知道 开工吧趁现在不用听比基的歌

translation.en: Oh, we gonna listen to Biggie.
translation.zh: 当然要听比基的歌

translation.en: ♪ Chickity-check it that B.I.G. Help out the record ♪
translation.zh: 比基正在做新专辑

translation.en: ♪ Come through with my Brooklyn crew ♪
translation.zh: 和布鲁克林的兄弟们一起努力

translation.en: ♪ You know how to do, stick and move ♪
translation.zh: 你知道该怎么办 时静时动

translation.en: ♪ The smack all dummies Looking funny ♪
translation.zh: 猛吸一口眼前就变得诡异

translation.en: ♪ Get jacked for your girl And your money I bet the brothers ♪
translation.zh: 妹子和钱都似乎遥远 兄弟们都正歇斯底里

translation.en: ♪ In the illest, rolling with pillars Dog guerillas Do or die ♪
translation.zh: 兄弟们都正歇斯底里 抱着柱子 四处乱转

translation.en: ♪ With mentalist, I, B.I.G. Do or D.I.E. ♪
translation.zh: 我比基还有脑子 不进步就死翘翘

translation.en: ♪ Bed-Stuy nigga repping NYC ♪
translation.zh: 我是纽约说唱的代表

translation.en: ♪ As I approach the scene with caution Skinny nigga never had room for flossing ♪
translation.zh: 我小心地靠近瘦人从不担心牙线没法用

translation.en: ♪ My mama was a Panther She's the proud one ♪
translation.zh: 我妈妈像只骄傲的黑豹

translation.en: ♪ Police around me Me and my niggas got rowdy, yeah ♪
translation.zh: 周围都是警察我和兄弟们忍不住动粗

translation.en: ♪ I want a gangsta bitch Like a batch of shit ♪
translation.zh: 我需要帮派气息的女人

translation.en: ♪ Getting drunk from the whole fifth Somebody gets to save me, I’m crazy ♪
translation.zh: 从第五大街醉醺醺走来 快来人救我 我要疯了

translation.en: ♪ I’m still praying While Brenda was having my baby ♪
translation.zh: 我仍在蠢蠢欲动而布兰达已怀了我的宝贝

translation.en: -[all] Yeah. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: ♪ We smoke hoes to c-notes ♪
translation.zh: 我们越吸越多

translation.en: ♪ My nine inch She chokes while she deep-throats ♪
translation.zh: 我把她的喉咙呛得发咳

translation.en: ♪ I climax, big black ass
translation.zh: 我兴奋至极 她丰满的身体真美丽

translation.en: ♪ She classy, flashy, bitch is on my titty Because a nigga needy ♪
translation.zh: 我兴奋至极 她丰满的身体真美丽 她激情难却 咬我的胸口

translation.en: ♪ I want my climb on the top Sacking Gs, yo ♪
translation.zh: 我想达到顶点 继续如幻如仙

translation.en: ♪ Smoking mad weed with my nigga She’s a Leo ♪
translation.zh: 和兄弟一起抽大麻 姑娘也在身边

translation.en: ♪ I’m 20, G.O. Shit I blow them back out ♪
translation.zh: 我抽的是20号 猛吸一口

translation.en: ♪ Sumo like Until I mother fucking pass out ♪
translation.zh: 差点晕得挂掉

translation.en: ♪ Yo, everywhere I go I’m toting this 44 ♪
translation.zh: 我四处游走 吸的是44号

translation.en: ♪ Just in case no one opened up Heaven’s door ♪
translation.zh: 我自己就能打开天堂大门

translation.en: ♪ Bill Clinton is a troublemaker Snatching lines off the streets ♪
translation.zh: 比尔克林顿是个麻烦精 街上混乱的情况 并无丝毫改善

translation.en: ♪ Like a motherfucking undertaker Dear Lord, can you hear me? ♪
translation.zh: 街上混乱的情况 并无丝毫改善 亲爱的主 你能听到否

translation.en: ♪ I bring 'em close But I really think they fear me ♪
translation.zh: 我把他们带来 但他们都怕我

translation.en: ♪ Take a look in my eyes Tell me where’s the hope ♪
translation.zh: 看着我的眼睛 告诉我希望在何处

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause in my mind We’re still hanging from a fucking rope ♪
translation.zh: 因为我觉得 我们依旧命悬一线

translation.en: Yeah, that’s right. That’s right.
translation.zh: 非常好…

translation.en: -Wilshire’s looking at somebody. -So they have a suspect? That's good.
translation.zh: -威尔夏分局正在调查某人-他们有嫌犯了？很好

translation.en: It’s more like a person of interest.
translation.zh: 只是案件相关人员

translation.en: Duane "Keefe D." Davis.
translation.zh: 杜恩戴维斯 外号基法

translation.en: It’s Keefe. He's from Compton. Southside Crip.
translation.zh: 是基弗 康普顿人南加州的瘸子帮成员

translation.en: -That makes him guilty of something. -I don't like him for this one.
translation.zh: 那他肯定不清白 但未必和本案有关 警督

translation.en: -Why not? -No witnesses IDed him.
translation.zh: -为什么？-目击者都未认出他

translation.en: Plus, what do you know about the East Coast-West Coast rivalry?
translation.zh: 另外 你知道东岸西岸说唱界的战争吗？

translation.en: -Enlighten me. -Okay, well, the Crips are team Bad Boy.
translation.zh: 说来听听 瘸子帮是支持坏小子唱片公司的也就是支持比基的

translation.en: That’s team Biggie. More importantly, Davis was seen at Biggie's table.
translation.zh: 瘸子帮是支持坏小子唱片公司的也就是支持比基的 更重要的是很多人看到他在派对上找过比基

translation.en: Who talks to someone in front of people before they shoot 'em? Doesn't make sense.
translation.zh: 谁会在杀一个人之前当着几百人的面和对方说话？ 这不符合常理

translation.en: Since when does a gang-related shooting make sense?
translation.zh: 黑帮枪击案什么时候符合过常理？

translation.en: Maybe it wasn't gang-related. This might have been a professional hit.
translation.zh: 也许不是黑帮仇杀 也许是专业杀手

translation.en: Oh, come on. You agree with that?
translation.zh: 得了吧 你也认同那种说法？

translation.en: -Some things bother me. The white S.U.V. -That might have been a diversion car.
translation.zh: 枪击案还有地方我没弄明白比如那辆白色SUV 很可能是辆干扰车

translation.en: Some people say it was heading north. Others say south.
translation.zh: 有人说它往北开 有人说向南开

translation.en: -All agree it was trying to cut off-- -Did it come from the grassy knoll?
translation.zh: 但都说它企图切断… 这背后难道有政治阴谋？

translation.en: -This isn't a joke. -Come on.
translation.zh: -没开玩笑-得了吧 普尔

translation.en: We need to have key people brought back to Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 我们得把关键人物叫回洛杉矶讯问比如吹牛老爹

translation.en: Puffy. Anybody with Biggie that night.
translation.zh: 当晚所有和比基在一起的人

translation.en: These people are our key witnesses and we haven’t questioned them yet.
translation.zh: 这些人都是重要目击者却没人去讯问他们

translation.en: Okay, I'll look into it. But you have a suspect.
translation.zh: 好的 我去办但你现在已经有了个嫌犯

translation.en: Who's lawyered up. Even if we liked him, we don't have anything to go at him with.
translation.zh: 他已经找了律师 就算我们想办他 手里都没他的把柄

translation.en: So find something. And if this guy is such a shit suspect, why did he lawyer up?
translation.zh: 那就去找 如果他心里没鬼 找律师干什么？

translation.en: 'Cause he's a gangster. That doesn't mean he did this.
translation.zh: 那是因为他是黑帮分子并不意味着他是本案凶手

translation.en: You're right. But we won't know for sure until you clear him. Get out of here.
translation.zh: 你说得对 但没有确凿证据前不能排除嫌疑你们走吧

translation.en: It's already been a month.
translation.zh: 案发已经一个月

translation.en: We can't focus our energy on someone there’s no evidence against.
translation.zh: 我们不能把精力耗在无证据指控的嫌犯身上

translation.en: -Well, maybe he'll just confess. -We need to work this like it's day one.
translation.zh: 谁知道呢？也许他会主动招供 我们必须从头开始调查

translation.en: Is there anything Wilshire missed?
translation.zh: 必须搞清楚威尔夏分局哪里有疏忽

translation.en: We'll talk to everybody at the Petersen Museum.
translation.zh: 我们得讯问当晚所有去过彼得森博物馆的人

translation.en: -This division should work this case. -It won't happen.
translation.zh: 全部门的人都该投入这个案子 那不可能

translation.en: -It happened when Cosby's kid got killed. -It was different.
translation.zh: 科斯比公子被杀就全员出动 -那个案子不一样？-为什么？

translation.en: -How? -You know, you're starting to grow on me,
translation.zh: 罗素 我开始对你有好感了

translation.en: but you can’t compare some rapper to Bill fricking Cosby? Okay?
translation.zh: 但你不能把说唱歌手和比尔科斯比相提并论

translation.en: Poole!
translation.zh: 普尔！

translation.en: Helping you out, I ran a D.M.V. check on that guy Wilshire gave you.
translation.zh: 我帮了你个忙 在车管局系统里查询了威尔夏分局的那个嫌犯

translation.en: Thanks, I already did that. Davis didn't have an Impala.
translation.zh: 多谢 我已经查过戴维斯名下没有英帕拉车

translation.en: I dug a little deeper. March of last year, Keefe D. got a speeding ticket.
translation.zh: 我查得更深 去年三月基弗吃过一张超速罚单

translation.en: Check out what he was driving.
translation.zh: 看看他开的是什么车

translation.en: A 1996 Chevrolet Impala, black.
translation.zh: 一辆1996年产雪佛兰黑色英帕拉

translation.en: It's just not registered to him.
translation.zh: 只是他并非车主

translation.en: -LAPD. search warrant! -[yelling]
translation.zh: 洛杉矶警局 有搜查令

translation.en: -Don’t shoot! -[cop] We got runners.
translation.zh: -别开枪！-有人逃跑

translation.en: [woman] Why are you busting in my damn door?
translation.zh: 你们为什么撞开我家门？

translation.en: -[cop] On the ground! -[woman] Where’s your search warrant?
translation.zh: -趴下 举起双手-不许你们这样撞门 你们的搜查令在哪？

translation.en: [cop] We got runners here.
translation.zh: 有人跑了

translation.en: -Calm down. -What are you guys doing in my house?
translation.zh: -别激动-我们只是… 你们来我家干什么？

translation.en: Clear!
translation.zh: 没人！

translation.en: -Ma’am, where is Keefe? -This is not his house.
translation.zh: -女士 基弗在哪？-这里不是他家

translation.en: -We know it’s not his house. Where is he? -What the hell you doing in my house?
translation.zh: 我们知道不是他家 知道他在哪吗？ 你们到底来我家干什么？

translation.en: -Ma’am, I need you to quiet down. -Hey, where is he going? Hey?
translation.zh: 女士请冷静 你最后一次见到… 他要去哪？

translation.en: -When’s the last time you saw him? -[woman mumbles]
translation.zh: 你最后见到他是什么时候？

translation.en: Get these off of me, man. You got the wrong guy.
translation.zh: 放开我 你们抓错人了

translation.en: -[cop 1] Hey, calm down! -[cop 2] Get up!
translation.zh: -老实点 起来！-起来！

translation.en: -[shouting in background] -[cop] Bathroom's clear!
translation.zh: 浴室里没人

translation.en: I'd say we got something to go at him with now, huh?
translation.zh: 现在有他的把柄了

translation.en: [sighs] Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -[Miller] Didn’t know where he is. -[Brian] When she see him last?
translation.zh: -她不知道他在哪-她上次见到他是什么时候？

translation.en: Girlfriend saw him yesterday. Lawyer’s trying to track him down.
translation.zh: 女朋友说从昨天开始就没见过他 律师说正在找他

translation.en: Track him down or tip him off?
translation.zh: 找他还是给他通风报信？

translation.en: [Russ] Car’s not registered in his name. Girlfriend doesn’t know where he is.
translation.zh: 车不在他的名下 女朋友说不知道他去哪了

translation.en: [Brian] When was the last time she saw him?
translation.zh: 她说上次什么时候见到他？

translation.en: -Yesterday is when she last saw him. -Hey.
translation.zh: -最后见他是昨天-看

translation.en: I think that’s him.
translation.zh: 我觉得就是他

translation.en: Hey, homie. Y'all looking for me?
translation.zh: 朋友 你们找我？

translation.en: Get down on your knees. Get down on the ground.
translation.zh: 跪下 -跪下-快跪下！

translation.en: -Do it now! -Get down!
translation.zh: -快点！-跪下！

translation.en: -[Brian] Do it now! Do it! -[Miller] Get down on your knees.
translation.zh: -快点！-跪下！

translation.en: Get down on your knees.
translation.zh: -跪下-举起手

translation.en: Interlock your fingers on your head.
translation.zh: 双手手指在脑后交叉

translation.en: [Brian] Lace 'em!
translation.zh: 照做

translation.en: [Faal] The vehicle has not been driven by my client for more than six months.
translation.zh: 我的当事人最后一次驾驶该车 距现在已超过六个月

translation.en: Other than it being the same model, nothing connects it
translation.zh: 除了与涉案车辆是同款车外 该车与克里斯托弗华莱士谋杀案没有任何关系

translation.en: to the murder of Christopher Wallace.
translation.zh: 该车与克里斯托弗华莱士谋杀案没有任何关系

translation.en: My client has not been arrested or charged and is cooperating voluntarily
translation.zh: 我的当事人并未被逮捕或起诉他是自愿合作

translation.en: and he will only talk about the shooting.
translation.zh: 他只谈论关于枪击案的话题

translation.en: We want to clear up a few things. Thank you for cooperating.
translation.zh: 我们只想搞清楚几个问题感谢你的合作

translation.en: Y'all barking up the wrong tree, homie. You’re wasting a lot of taxpayer’s money.
translation.zh: 你们找错人了 朋友 你们在浪费纳税人的税金

translation.en: Why don't you point us in the right direction, Keefe?
translation.zh: 不如你给我们指条明路 基弗？

translation.en: I'm here. Ask what you got to.
translation.zh: 我已经来了 随便问问题

translation.en: Okay. Were you at the Petersen Auto Museum,
translation.zh: 好的 比基被杀当晚你参加了《Vibe》杂志

translation.en: attending the Vibe Party the night Biggie was killed?
translation.zh: 在彼得森汽车博物馆举办的派对吗？

translation.en: -Everybody was there. Shit was crazy. -Did you drive your Impala there?
translation.zh: 人人都去了 挤得要死 你是开英帕拉去的吗？

translation.en: Again, the vehicle has not been driven by my client for more than six months.
translation.zh: 再说一遍 我的当事人 最后一次驾驶该车距现在已超过六个月

translation.en: Are you sure? Forensics is going to run all sorts of tests on it.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？ 鉴证科会对车辆进行各种检测

translation.en: I drove a '95 Cutlass, a rental. Was waiting on it when Biggie got shot.
translation.zh: 当晚我开的是1995年产短剑敞篷 租的 比基中枪时我正坐在车里等待

translation.en: Were you waiting on the street or...?
translation.zh: 你是在马路上等吗？

translation.en: I was in the garage. You can check the surveillance cameras.
translation.zh: 不 我在停车场里你们可以去查监控录像

translation.en: Had on a blue shirt, blue Jordans.
translation.zh: 我穿的是蓝色上衣 蓝色乔丹篮球鞋

translation.en: I was waiting with my homies, Wonder Mike and Wendall.
translation.zh: 和我的朋友迈克和温德尔一起等

translation.en: What color were their Jordans?
translation.zh: 他们穿的篮球鞋是什么颜色？

translation.en: Okay, let's back up. Did you see Biggie and Puffy at the party?
translation.zh: 说说派对吧 你在派对上见到比基和吹牛老爹了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I spoke to 'em.
translation.zh: 是的 我和他们说过话

translation.en: Was that the first time or did you know 'em?
translation.zh: 是初次交谈 还是之前就认识？

translation.en: I know 'em a little bit.
translation.zh: -我算是认识他们-什么意思？

translation.en: What does that mean? Did you do security for Biggie?
translation.zh: -我算是认识他们-什么意思？ 你为比基做过保安？

translation.en: You need to understand. He will only talk about where he was
translation.zh: 你要明白 他只回答当时他在哪里

translation.en: and what he was doing the night of the shooting.
translation.zh: 以及案发当晚他在做什么

translation.en: -That is the deal. -That is bullshit.
translation.zh: -我们说好的-一派胡言

translation.en: Keefe, I don't like you for this murder, okay? But I have some simple questions.
translation.zh: 基弗 我说实话 我不觉得你是凶手 但我有些问题 是很简单的问题 希望你能回答

translation.en: -I just need you to answer them. -You took my car. Word is out.
translation.zh: 是很简单的问题 希望你能回答 你们带走了我的车这事已经传出去了

translation.en: Shit, it's a target on my head, homie.
translation.zh: 这对我的名誉伤害很大

translation.en: He just wants to clear his name. That is all.
translation.zh: 他只想证明自己的清白这是他唯一的目的

translation.en: Fine, Keefe. Fine. What did you talk about with Biggie and Puffy that night?
translation.zh: 好的 基弗 你当晚和比基、吹牛老爹都聊了什么？

translation.en: Nothin'. You know, they was drinking, said what's up, how you doin'?
translation.zh: 没聊什么 他们正在喝酒就打了招呼 说了你好

translation.en: Okay. And that's it?
translation.zh: 就这些？

translation.en: Did you see anyone who might want to hurt Biggie?
translation.zh: 你见到可能想伤害比基的人吗？

translation.en: -I didn't see nothin'. -How about in general?
translation.zh: 我什么都没看到 笼统地说呢？平时有谁想伤害比基？

translation.en: -Who would want to hurt Biggie? -Shit, you guys know.
translation.zh: 笼统地说呢？平时有谁想伤害比基？ 你们当然知道

translation.en: No, what does that mean? Death Row? Suge? Suge?
translation.zh: 不知道 什么意思？ 是指死囚唱片公司？苏格？

translation.en: -Not sayin' nothin' either. -That's the problem. Nobody says anything.
translation.zh: 我什么都没说 问题就在这里 没人开口

translation.en: Meanwhile people's lives get destroyed. This isn’t about Biggie being famous.
translation.zh: 与此同时有人的生命被摧毁 这和比基是名人没关系这种不关我事的心态必须改变

translation.en: -This mentality has to stop. -This interview is over.
translation.zh: 这和比基是名人没关系这种不关我事的心态必须改变 这次会面到此为止

translation.en: We’ll have to talk to him again, anyway.
translation.zh: 反正以后我们还得找他来问话

translation.en: He did not do it and you know it. Thank you, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 他不是凶手 你们心知肚明谢谢警官们

translation.en: Has to stop, Keefe! [sighs]
translation.zh: 这种心态必须改变 基弗

translation.en: [Daryn] What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得如何？

translation.en: I think it's a lot of bragging about his dick and drug-dealing.
translation.zh: 我觉得他对自己的老二和贩毒事业都使劲吹牛

translation.en: That’s what I think.
translation.zh: 这就是我的看法

translation.en: Biggie was a storyteller, liked to exaggerate.
translation.zh: 比基擅长讲故事 就喜欢讲大话

translation.en: You want politics, I'll hit with you some Tupac.
translation.zh: 你想听政治理念？ -我找几首图帕克的给你-不了

translation.en: No, I'll pass, thank you. What are you reading?
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢 -你在读什么？-是重读

translation.en: -About Death Row. -You read the book about Poole?
translation.zh: 写死囚唱片公司的 你读过关于普尔的书吗？

translation.en: I've read every book about Biggie, Pac, this case, seen every documentary too.
translation.zh: 我读过所有关于比基、图帕克和本案的书 也看过每一部纪录片

translation.en: That’s good. That means I don’t have to.
translation.zh: 太好了 那我就不用看了

translation.en: -[Brian] Knock, knock. -There he is.
translation.zh: -有人吗？-他来了

translation.en: Daryn, this is our supervisor, Brian Tyndall.
translation.zh: 达林 这位是我们的上司布莱恩廷德尔

translation.en: -Thanks for having me onboard. -Thank your boyfriend.
translation.zh: 感谢让我加入 谢你男朋友吧 你还要让谁加入？

translation.en: Who else you want to bring in?
translation.zh: 谢你男朋友吧 你还要让谁加入？

translation.en: I was thinking we could make this a federal task force.
translation.zh: 我考虑应该弄成个联邦级别的专案组

translation.en: Yeah, that's ain’t going to happen.
translation.zh: 那不可能

translation.en: What do you...
translation.zh: 你说…

translation.en: You told me that I could have whatever I want. Whoever I want.
translation.zh: 你答应过会满足我所有人力物力要求

translation.en: -And I gave you this guy. -Still using a cloned cell phone?
translation.zh: 是的 所以他来了 你还在克隆别人的手机吗 警官？

translation.en: That was five years ago.
translation.zh: 那是五年前了

translation.en: Stupid mistake I more than paid the price for.
translation.zh: 愚蠢的错误 让我付出了巨大代价

translation.en: We all got our crosses. Okay. Why federal?
translation.zh: 我们都有自己的罪孽要背负你说说 为什么要联邦级别？

translation.en: Resources, reach. If we don't go big on this, it'll never work.
translation.zh: 资源、权限 如果权限不够大 这个案子没法破

translation.en: The Torres case was federal and that's why I'm here.
translation.zh: 托雷斯案专案组是联邦级别的所以我才做出了成绩

translation.en: -This is different. -You're damn right.
translation.zh: -这个案子不一样-当然不一样

translation.en: This murder happened ten years ago and the victim was famous.
translation.zh: 它发生在十年前 而且受害人是名人

translation.en: -There aren't gonna be new players here. -You're losing me.
translation.zh: 局里已经没有新的人手了 我不明白 怎么会…

translation.en: We are going to have to lean on people, like we’ve never leaned on them before.
translation.zh: 我们必须借助外力 不顾一切地借助外力

translation.en: -Even if I agreed with you-- -How it's going to look?
translation.zh: 就算我同意… 外界会怎么想？

translation.en: How's what going to look?
translation.zh: 什么怎么想？

translation.en: Voletta Wallace believes that the LAPD. played a direct part in her son's murder
translation.zh: 瓦莱塔华莱士认为洛杉矶警局 是她儿子谋杀案的直接参与者

translation.en: and now only members of the LAPD. are going to help prove her right or wrong?
translation.zh: 而现在办案人员全是洛杉矶警局的人 这证明她是错还是对？

translation.en: [exhales] It's a big ask.
translation.zh: 你的要求太高了

translation.en: It will take some time, but I'll work on it.
translation.zh: 要花些时间 但我会尽力

translation.en: Please do. Thank you.
translation.zh: 拜托你 谢谢

translation.en: I have good news and bad news. What do you want first?
translation.zh: 好消息和坏消息 -你想先听哪个？-你决定

translation.en: -It’s up to you. -Shell casings found at scene are rare.
translation.zh: -你想先听哪个？-你决定 现场找到的子弹壳非常稀有

translation.en: -How rare? -Only two distributors in the country.
translation.zh: 多稀有？ 全美国只有两家经销商

translation.en: Makes matching the casings to a suspect easier. The bad news?
translation.zh: 更容易通过比对弹壳找到嫌犯 -坏消息是什么？-基弗的那辆英帕拉

translation.en: Keefe D.'s Impala. Nothing inside ties it to the shooting.
translation.zh: -坏消息是什么？-基弗的那辆英帕拉 里面没有任何与枪击案有关的证据

translation.en: We can't determine the last time it was driven.
translation.zh: 所以没法确定最后一次使用的时间

translation.en: -But if we can connect Keefe to the ammo-- -How do we do that?
translation.zh: 但如果我们能把基弗与子弹联系起来…

translation.en: We can't even connect him to a gun.
translation.zh: 怎么可能？我们都找不到他跟枪的关联

translation.en: Jesus Christ, easy.
translation.zh: 老天 你急什么？

translation.en: Just saying he wasn't exactly an open book to us.
translation.zh: 我只是说他对我们没有全说实话

translation.en: Who is? Who is open with us?
translation.zh: 谁做到了？谁全说实话了？

translation.en: Yes, I remember your speech. That was very moving.
translation.zh: 我记得你的演讲 非常打动人

translation.en: We need to show Kevin Gaines’ picture to witnesses.
translation.zh: 我觉得该把凯文盖恩斯的照片给目击者看看

translation.en: This shit again.
translation.zh: 不会吧 又要翻这个旧账

translation.en: You think Wilshire only got a tip about Keefe D.? They got hundreds.
translation.zh: 你真以为只有一条关于基弗的线报？ 他们收到了几百条线报

translation.en: I read every single one. Guess what. One said Gaines might have been involved.
translation.zh: 我全都读了 你猜怎样？ 其中一条说盖恩斯可能涉案

translation.en: -Making it a good anonymous tip. -Gaines knew Knight.
translation.zh: 真是有价值的匿名线报啊 盖恩斯认识奈特

translation.en: So Gaines was banging Suge Knight's ex while also acting as a hitman for him?
translation.zh: 盖恩斯一边搞苏格奈特的前妻 一边还给前夫当杀手？

translation.en: -I didn't say that. -It sounds like what you’re saying
translation.zh: 我没那么说 听起来就是那个意思却没有任何证据支撑

translation.en: with no evidence to back it up. If it leaks, Russ,
translation.zh: 听起来就是那个意思却没有任何证据支撑 如果你这样查却走漏风声媒体才不会在乎

translation.en: the press won't care, if you don't have any evidence, okay?
translation.zh: 如果你这样查却走漏风声媒体才不会在乎 你有没有证据呢

translation.en: No, that’s a nightmare for the department.
translation.zh: 但是等等 警局会丢光了脸

translation.en: -Okay, but we need to consult Vegas PD. -Vegas?
translation.zh: -好吧 但至少我们得咨询赌城警局-赌城？

translation.en: There is a real possibility that the murder of Biggie Smalls
translation.zh: 比基斯莫兹命案很有可能

translation.en: is related to the murder of Tupac. It's our job--
translation.zh: 与图帕克命案有直接关联我们的职责就是…

translation.en: That’s our job? Or is it your excuse not to go home to your sad, lonely apartment?
translation.zh: -是吗？是我们的职责？-对 还是你不想回到你的破单身公寓的借口？

translation.en: Give me a little goddamn credit here. You got those pictures of your family,
translation.zh: 能不能跟我说句实话？ 你放了这么多家人照片

translation.en: but not once have I seen you ever talk to your wife.
translation.zh: 但从来没给你老婆打过电话

translation.en: [cop] Poole, you got a visitor.
translation.zh: 普尔 有人找你

translation.en: [Russ sighs] Miss Wallace?
translation.zh: 华莱士女士？

translation.en: Yes. You are Detective Russell Poole, the one now investigating my son's murder?
translation.zh: 是我 你就是罗素普尔警探？ 调查我儿子谋杀案的警官？

translation.en: That’s right, me and my partner. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的 我和我搭档在调查

translation.en: Why haven't you called me?
translation.zh: 那你为什么没找过我？

translation.en: Ma’am, I'm very sorry for your loss, but I wasn't the first detective to...
translation.zh: 女士 请节哀 但我不是第一个…

translation.en: No, you're right.
translation.zh: 不 你说得对

translation.en: You’re right. I should have called you.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我应该找你

translation.en: I promise this department will do whatever it takes to find out who killed your son.
translation.zh: 但我向你保证我们警局会尽全力调查 谁是杀害你儿子的凶手

translation.en: Listen to yourself. Trying to convince me the LAPD cares
translation.zh: 听听你说的话 想让我相信洛杉矶警局

translation.en: about the murder of a young black man.
translation.zh: 居然在乎一个年轻黑人的命案

translation.en: -I care. I care very much. -Why?
translation.zh: -我在乎 我非常在乎-那为什么？

translation.en: Why did I have to come see you?
translation.zh: 为什么是我先来找你？

translation.en: Is there any information you could give us that could help with this investigation?
translation.zh: 你有什么线索能提供 帮助我们调查此案吗？

translation.en: I knew nothing about Notorious B.I.G. or Biggie Smalls.
translation.zh: 我不了解臭名昭著先生或比基斯莫兹

translation.en: I only knew about Christopher.
translation.zh: 我只了解克里斯托弗

translation.en: So, no, I cannot help you.
translation.zh: 所以不行 我帮不了你

translation.en: I just wanted to meet the man in charge.
translation.zh: 我只是想见见负责人

translation.en: Would you tell me... Uh...
translation.zh: 能跟我说说吗？

translation.en: Would you tell me about Christopher?
translation.zh: 关于克里斯托弗？

translation.en: Christopher was my only son.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗是我的独子

translation.en: His father left us when he was two years old,
translation.zh: 他两岁时他父亲离开了我们

translation.en: but I raised Christopher to be a positive person...
translation.zh: 但在我的养育下克里斯托弗积极向上

translation.en: ...to cherish life every single day.
translation.zh: 每天都珍惜生活

translation.en: They say he dealt drugs when he was younger,
translation.zh: 他们说他小时候贩毒

translation.en: but I never wanted to believe that.
translation.zh: 我不愿意相信

translation.en: "Not my Christopher," I would say.
translation.zh: 我会说：“那不是我的克里斯托弗”

translation.en: I didn’t know that part of him.
translation.zh: 我不了解他的那一面

translation.en: I didn’t know so many things they said about him.
translation.zh: 他们说的很多关于他的事我都不知道

translation.en: I never even listened to his music until after he died.
translation.zh: 他死前我从没听过他的音乐

translation.en: And when I did, the profanity made me cry.
translation.zh: 我终于听到时被里面大段脏话吓哭了

translation.en: His songs were grotesque stories...
translation.zh: 他的歌都是些奇怪的故事

translation.en: ...about the stink of this world.
translation.zh: 写的都是这个世界的丑恶

translation.en: But they also read so beautifully to me.
translation.zh: 但我听起来都那么美

translation.en: Christopher was loyal.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗待人忠厚

translation.en: Christopher was a giver.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗乐于奉献

translation.en: And all this stuff about him and Tupac...
translation.zh: 关于他和图帕克的不和传言…

translation.en: They were friends.
translation.zh: 他们是朋友

translation.en: Do you hear me?
translation.zh: 你听到了吗？

translation.en: Him and Tupac were friends.
translation.zh: 他和图帕克是朋友

translation.en: Yo, dog. I can't believe you worked with Janet Jackson.
translation.zh: 兄弟 真不敢相信你和珍妮杰克逊合作过

translation.en: I been feelin' honeys since Diff’rent Strokes.
translation.zh: 自从有那部《细路仔》我就开始受欢迎了

translation.en: Shit had a nigga running around like I was Willis.
translation.zh: 他们总把我和剧里的威利斯放在一起比较

translation.en: Shit. They asked me to take an AIDS test.
translation.zh: 他们让我去做艾滋病检查

translation.en: Say word? For a movie?
translation.zh: 什么？为了那部电影？

translation.en: No lie. Everybody came at me.
translation.zh: 没错 所有人都来劝我

translation.en: First the producer came, then the director came.
translation.zh: 先是制作人来劝 然后导演来劝

translation.en: I told 'em if I was really going to hit that, then I'll take four tests.
translation.zh: 我跟他们说如果我真要做 我会做四遍检查

translation.en: Otherwise hell, no, that shit's disrespectful.
translation.zh: 不然想都别想 太不尊重人了

translation.en: But you and Janet tight, right?
translation.zh: 但你和珍妮关系不错吧？

translation.en: Shit, home girl changed her number up on me.
translation.zh: 她为了躲我把电话号码都改了

translation.en: Had me thinking we'd play paintball after we wrap.
translation.zh: 我不禁觉得之前她都是跟我逢场作戏

translation.en: Damn, she plays you like that?
translation.zh: 该死 她这样耍你？

translation.en: This business is dirty. You got to keep your boys close.
translation.zh: 这行水很深你可得看管好你这帮兄弟

translation.en: So, my boys all hoping I get on your status.
translation.zh: 我的兄弟们都希望我能取得你这样的地位

translation.en: You trying to be like Pac? 'Cause I ain't just starring in movies.
translation.zh: 你想像图帕克一样？ 我可不只是客串电影

translation.en: I'm writing 'em, producing 'em, on top of my music.
translation.zh: 我还写剧本 当制作人 我不光玩音乐

translation.en: Shit. The hustle don't stop, baby.
translation.zh: 不会吧 你做这么多事

translation.en: -It's a different type of hustle. -Mm.
translation.zh: 都是不同类型的

translation.en: Let me hit that.
translation.zh: 给我抽一口

translation.en: Let me show you something.
translation.zh: 给你看个东西

translation.en: Damn, dog. You read all this?
translation.zh: 兄弟 这都是你读的书？

translation.en: I ain't out here just rapping about money and bitches.
translation.zh: 我可不是整天只唱金钱女人

translation.en: There's levels to this thug-life shit.
translation.zh: “匪帮生活”可以有不同的层次的

translation.en: Hey... Machiavelli?
translation.zh: 马基雅维利著？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: "Men are driven by two principal impulses, either by love or by fear."
translation.zh: “人主要受两种因素驱动即爱和恐惧”

translation.en: He the shit.
translation.zh: 他很厉害

translation.en: You tryin' to rob a bank or something?
translation.zh: 你是要抢银行吗？

translation.en: [as Al Pacino] Hey, man. You say hello to my little friend.
translation.zh: 见见我的小朋友

translation.en: -[laughs] -You buggin’, dog.
translation.zh: 你真行 兄弟

translation.en: Nigga, they ain't loaded. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 这都没子弹 你玩玩

translation.en: -Shit, up in there. -Mm.
translation.zh: 拿在手里试试

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, baby.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey. Uh...
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah, what is it?
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-挺好 怎么了？

translation.en: So, Compton P.D. called. Detective wanted to relay some info about Keefe D.
translation.zh: 康普顿警局打来电话 警探想提供些关于基弗的情报

translation.en: What kind of information?
translation.zh: 哪种情报？

translation.en: Keefe's got a nephew, guy named Orlando Anderson.
translation.zh: 基弗有个外甥 叫奥兰多安德森

translation.en: -Who's Orlando Anderson? -Might be the guy that killed Tupac.
translation.zh: -谁是奥兰多安德森？-可能是杀图帕克的凶手

translation.en: Yep, they like him for it.
translation.zh: 没错 他们认为他嫌疑很大

translation.en: -And Keefe's his uncle? -Yeah. And they're real close.
translation.zh: 基弗是他舅舅？ 对 他们关系很好

translation.en: So, I was thinking, maybe we should take that trip up to Vegas after all, huh?
translation.zh: 所以我想还是可以去拉斯维加斯一趟

translation.en: Tyndall came through.
translation.zh: 廷德尔搞定了

translation.en: Got the green light to go outside the LAPD. for the task force.
translation.zh: 专案组成员不限定在洛杉矶警局内部人员

translation.en: Feds, Compton, whoever we need.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局、康普顿警局想要谁都可以

translation.en: -Took him long enough. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 花了这么长时间

translation.en: I was starting to get worried I was going to be stuck in here with you forever.
translation.zh: 我开始担心我会和你永远困在这里

translation.en: Yeah, you wish.
translation.zh: 你想得美

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: [Daryn] Biggie was 24 when he was killed.
translation.zh: 比基被杀时才24岁

translation.en: Tupac was 25.
translation.zh: 图帕克被杀时才25岁

translation.en: Kids, man.
translation.zh: 都只是孩子

translation.en: -[Greg] I just want to solve this thing. -Wherever it leads.
translation.zh: 我一定要破这个案子 不管证据指向什么结果

translation.en: Wherever it leads.
translation.zh: 不管证据指向什么结果
